bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Multiple receipts in this collection offer variations on the spelling of the last name. John Kinkead is also listed as John Kincade. Charles Kincad is also mentioned as Charles Kinkaid. One receipt refers to a John Kinon (Kenon?), which may also be a variant of Kinkead. There is also a receipt for a Robert Kinkead. It is unclear how they may be related.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains various receipts mostly from Augusta and Bath County, VA. These receipts include tax receipts, a newspaper subscription payment, business transactions, and a promissory note. These items date from 1780 to 1848. Names listed on the receipts include the following: Robert Kinkead, John Kinkead (Kincade), Charles Kincad (Kinkaid), John Kinon (Kenon?), Albert J. Coleman.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged in chronological order.
